name: Splendid Historic Castle
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Splendid Historic Castle will be the scene of your spectacular and atypical wedding! Romantic and enchanting, this splendid 300-year-old castle will be privatized especially for you. It will reflect its prestige and authenticity on your celebration. Come and discover the surprises reserved for you...After 200 years of being closed for event the doors have now reowned and Jean-Nicolas and his wife are ready to welcome you into their chateau.
For each stage of your wedding celebration, modular spaces are available to you:
A large crystal marquee (250m2) for your dinner and the dance floor with a magnificent view of the valley
Ideal for up to 200 people
Lighting and parquet floor provided
Wide modular openings and transparent roof
Long oval head table
Rose park for secular ceremony, breathtaking view of the valley
Forecourt of the castle for the reception
Several reception rooms (cocktail reception, brunch, family moments, make-up area, etc.)
Large indoor chapel for religious / secular ceremony
Outside relaxation space with Nordic bath hottub (heated by wood and seats 6 people)
Room reserved for children (games and sleep)
Vaulted wine cellar and its tasting at discretion (family moments, moment for the groom and his witnesses...)
Many options are available to you to make you live an unforgettable wedding reception.
INCLUDED : Round tables (6 to 8 people), head table (10 to 12 people), white stylish chairs, tableclothes. Ideal for the wedding dinner and dancing. Ideal for the sunday brunch. There is also a long wooden carriage which can be used for a bar which is at your disposal.
If you are after more of an outdoor feel then you can also use the forecourt or rose garden which can cater for up to 250 guests. Seating can be arranged outiside under the large shades centenary trees, the options are all yours. Or if you are a smaller wedding party you can make use of the indoor red sitting room which will seat up to 60 guests for a more intimate reception.
The Château will be privatized exclusively for your wedding. You will experience an exceptional party, carefully prepared by the event team at your side. We want this venue to feel like your home for the duration of your stay and even have an open wine cave concept where people would pickup the bottles as if they were at home. All tables (round 8 people) and Napoleon chairs are provided as well as bedroom bedding and bathroom accessories. A video projector is also available if necessary which can be a great addition for entertaining the children or playing a personal montage video of you and your fiancee.
There is space for 20 guests to stay in the château (15) and in the outhouse (5). Family, double and single bedrooms are available with bathrooms and toilettes close by. We are happy to recommend trustful local guest houses for the remainder of your guests.
INCLUDED : Bedclothes and towels.
For the bride and groom, a bridal suite with a king size canopy bed, a shower and a bath, in an 18th century design (marble chimney, wooden panels, wooden parquet floor) is also available.
Full package pricing starts from 10,900€ for Friday morning to Sunday evening.
We look forward to hearing from you and sharing some more information on this Chateau and the prospect of holding your wedding with us.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Golf course nearby
Hot tub
Maid service
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Hotel recommendation list
Marquee available on site
Chapel on site
Recommended wedding planner
Recommended caterer
Recommended suppliers list available

All Inclusive Option
